thread.title: Meet The Cast Of ‘Alien: Covenant’ Before They Meet Their Doom In This Special Prologue
thread.title_full: Meet The Cast Of ‘Alien: Covenant’ Before They Meet Their Doom In This Special Prologue

author: Andrew Roberts
title: Meet The Cast Of ‘Alien: Covenant’ Before They Meet Their Doom In This Special Prologue
text:
EMAIL 
If you caught the latest episode of Legion , you were teased about this prologue for Alien: Covenant that gives us a spirited introduction to the crew of the colony ship that shares a name with the film’s title. Not only do we learn that James Franco is the captain of the ship and feeling a bit under the weather, but the rest of the crew are a bunch of party animals. We get to see Danny McBride appeal to everybody’s bad side while getting seriously drunk, Katherine Waterston give a heck of a speech to inspire the crew, and everybody else giving the film that “fun” moment before everybody turns into xenomorph chow . Share This
